page.title: 16GAMES:FRENCHWOOD C.P.PRESTON
page.content: We play different games in different seasons: {WINTER}- football,2-ball,Bulldog,Tig, netball. {SPRING}- skipping,Hide-and-seek,Cops- and-robbers,Jacks,netball. {SUMMER}- cricket,running,rounders, Bottle-of-poison,marbles. {AUTUMN}- Conkers,football,skipping. We have only a small yard near to our classrooms. So, because windows kept being broken, we now use soft foam balls for our games of football, rounders and cricket. {Marbles}is our favourite game in these summer months.Bulldog and Bottle of-poison are unusual games of tig and chase, using the painted lines on our playground as dens and bases. Such games as skipping, 2-ball and football we play all the year round.
